Nhân Viên Quản Lý Sản Xuất (biết Tiếng Nhật)
Nhân Viên Quản Lý Sản Xuất (biết Tiếng Nhật)
Lô 3, TS 14, Khu Công Nghiệp Tiên Sơn, Bắc Ninh

+ Assist production management for admistration works, such as resource/stock control, PO management..vv.. + Interpreter for Japanese experts, communication between Japanese experts with Vietnamese staffs and workers. + Translating related document, production process,.vv.. + Supporting and implementing all necessary instructions to Manager. + Other if any requests

+ Vietnamese, Female + Age is no request. + University graduate with major in Japanese or Business school + Fluently in listening, Speaking, Reading and Writing (Equivalent to N2 level up) + Good skill in office software’s: Word, Excel… + Experience in Production Control + Candidate who is familiar with ISO9001 is preferred + Good health and ability to work independently or good sense of team-work + Ability to work under high pressure Benefits for successful candidates: + High salary levels and bonuses will be applied in accordance with the job career, performance + Professional working conditions as well as many career advancement opportunities in our new setup factory. + The company has commuting bus to pick up employees to go to work in Tien Son Industrial Zone, Bac Ninh Province (22 km far from Hanoi Center) + Working regulations and Social Insurance contribution are applied according to the Law of Vietnam (JapanWorks)

and.attribute: Công ty SUMITOMO ELECTRIC INTERCONNECT PRODUCTS VIETNAM là doanh nghiệp chế xuất 100% vốn nước ngoài của Nhật bản chuyên sản xuất và kinh doanh các mặt hàng sau: - Trục gia nhiệt, gia áp của máy in laser (“Roller”) - Linh kiện dây nối điện tử dạng bản dẹp mềm (“FFC”) - Linh kiện dây nối điện tử dạng bản tròn (“CBA”) Địa chỉ: Lô 3, TS 14, Khu Công Nghiệp Tiên Sơn, Tỉnh Bắc Ninh (Cách trung tâm Hà Nội chừng 22 km) More jobs from this employer
